formattedAddress: 1115 Broadway Suite 1042, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1115 Broadway Suite 1042, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Parra is incredible. He is so attentive and really tailors the treatment for my specific issues. He spent so much time with me and really listened to how I live my life and gave me tools to use that had such a positive impact. He even got on the mat with me to show me how to stretch properly. And addition of Paul for physical therapy turns a standard visit into a supercharged care session. I highly recommend them.

text.text: Dr. Parra is incredible. He is so attentive and really tailors the treatment for my specific issues. He spent so much time with me and really listened to how I live my life and gave me tools to use that had such a positive impact. He even got on the mat with me to show me how to stretch properly. And addition of Paul for physical therapy turns a standard visit into a supercharged care session. I highly recommend them.

originalText.text: Dr. Parra is always a pleasure to visit; even when not feeling at my best physically. I do know that every time I have left an appointment, I have always felt much better physically right after, and the days that follow. I began with him this past August and have improved tremendously. He is attentive, patient, professional, has an amazing “no wait time” record, and put his patients first. He has also been flexible with scheduling, and is great with follow up reminders. I continue to visit on a monthly basis for general upkeep and maintenance to avoid further injury. I recommend him highly if you are looking for a great chiropractor.

originalText.text: Highly recommend! The staff and Dr. Parra are so efficient while still making it a personable, warm, and welcoming environment. Dr. Parra was empathetic towards my issue with low back pain and persistent sciatica. He has done a marvelous job at not only treating my issues but educating me on them. He’s always ready to answer any question no matter how small.

originalText.text: Please do not waste your time going to another chiropractor! Dr. Jon really cares about how you feel and wants to make sure you feel better when you leave each appointment than when you came in. I have seen other chiropractors before and could tell after one visit that Dr. Jon is uniquely passionate about what he does. Really can’t recommend him enough!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Parra, he is a remarkable chiropractor. He is very knowledgeable, has a gentle demeanor, and really takes the time to listen to your concerns, comments, and/or questions. I came in with severe lower back pain due to pregnancy and after just 1 visit I felt great. I will be continuing my treatment with him as my pregnancy progresses.
